text:
He (was) a historically partisan Speaker who oversaw a Republican majority mired in unprecedented chaos and confusion.

The American people deserve better.

Today is a solemn day. For the first time ever, a Speaker has been booted from office. 

Kevin McCarthy ceded control of the House to MAGA extremists and they ultimately did him in.

He has embraced Donald Trump at every turn.
He has enabled the MAGA extremists in his party.
He has broken his word over and over again.
He has threatened the American people with economic catastrophe and a government shutdown.

Kevin McCarthy does not deserve to be Speaker.

Democrats protected American families from a Republican shutdown, and now I am confident that we will deliver vital funding for our allies in Ukraine.

The United States must continue to lead the transatlantic alliance and stand up to Vladimir Putin.

If there's one thing we've learned over the last nine months, it's that we can't trust MAGA extremists when it comes to America's economy.

I've got a plan to end the brinkmanship and make sure they never take our economy hostage again.
thehill.com/opinion/campaign…

House Republicans want to claim that "no Republican wants a shutdown."

I have the quotes right here.
My statement on the passing of United @Steelworkers International President Tom Conway:

It seems like Speaker McCarthy is more concerned with his own job rather than the thousands of jobs that would be lost in a government shutdown.

And as long as he keeps trying to appease the far-right, they'll keep driving America towards a #RepublicanShutdown.
Wishing everyone observing Yom Kippur a meaningful and reflective day of atonement and renewal. May your fast be easy, and your prayers bring you peace.

We could be just days away from another Republican government shutdown.

The fact is: you don't see this happening under Democrats.

Today is the 30th annual National Public Lands Day! As America’s biggest single-day volunteer conservation  effort, today reminds us what’s possible when we come together to take action to protect our public lands. #NPLD

It was one-year ago today that my former intern, Everett Beauregard, was tragically taken from us by an act of gun violence on a Philadelphia street. This week, w/ his parents, family, and friends in the gallery, I honored Everett's legacy in the House chamber.

This Republican civil war isn’t just about Speaker McCarthy’s job anymore.

It’s about the millions of Americans who will go unpaid and the people who could lose their jobs if House Republicans cause a government shutdown.

Under @HouseDemocrats, we delivered historic legislation to rebuild our infrastructure, rescue our economy, and bring down the cost of living.

House Republicans have delivered nothing but chaos — and now their extremism has brought us to the brink of a government shutdown.

My Republican colleagues seem to think the American people need to improve their "work ethic."

The reality is that the American work ethic built this country — and that we have the most productive workforce in the world today.

I've got a warning for my Republican colleagues.

The history of the last three decades has been clear: the party that forces a government shutdown loses the next election and loses it badly.

Deeply saddened to learn of the sudden passing of Temple University’s acting president JoAnne Epps. My thoughts and heartfelt condolences go out to her family and to the entire Temple University community as they cope with this tragic loss.

As state legislatures target voters and restrict voting access, the fight for voting rights has never been more urgent. 
I am proud to be an original co-sponsor of the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act (introduced today) to protect the right to vote & safeguard our democracy against continued attacks.
.@HouseDemocrats will fight back against these cruel cuts, we will fight back against these extreme budget ideas, and we will always fight to invest in the American people.

I was just asked if House Democrats would work with Speaker McCarthy to keep the government open.

The fact is — we've already done it. We delivered a bipartisan budget agreement that he is now reneging on.

Just hours after announcing a partisan continuing resolution, the 'no' votes from their own party are already piling up.

This fantasy far-right continuing resolution is nothing more than a transparent attempt to make legislative arsonists look like responsible adults.
My statement on today's UAW strike
🍎🍯Shana Tova to all celebrating Rosh Hashanah! May the New Year bring you sweetness, joy, and renewal. Wishing you a year filled with love, health, and peace. 🕊️#RoshHashanah #ShanaTova

As the report I requested from @USCBO shows, climate-fueled flood risk will only increase by 2050, threatening all our communities.

I will keep working to ensure our neighborhoods in Philly have the resources to address this growing threat.

When Donald Trump says "jump" House Republicans ask "how high?"

On a bogus impeachment of President Biden, on a government shutdown, on their push for more tax cuts for the rich — and on everything else.
nytimes.com/2023/09/13/us/po…

House Republicans have uncovered no evidence of wrongdoing by the President – but the truth doesn’t matter to them.

This partisan impeachment scheme is nothing more than a desperate attempt by Speaker McCarthy to appease the most extreme MAGA Republicans in his caucus.

Eight months in, House Republicans still haven't done anything to lower the cost of living or make life better for American families.

They're apparently too busy plotting a government shutdown and trying to score political points with a baseless impeachment inquiry.

MAGA Republicans are threatening to shut down the government unless they get a bogus impeachment of President Biden.

It's an impeachment about nothing. The lack of evidence doesn't matter — because the truth isn't the point.

It was a pleasure to host a townhall recently in one of the Philadelphia neighborhoods in my newly redrawn Congressional District. 

Thank you to the residents who came out and to the Society Hill Homeowners Association for helping to put this townhall together. 

It is always good to hear from my constituents directly at events like these as I continue to work hard representing you in Washington, DC.

Remembering the lives lost and the resilience of a nation on this solemn anniversary of 9/11. Let us honor the heroes who ran towards danger to save others, and strive for a world where unity and peace prevail over hatred and division. 
#NeverForget #September11 #UnitedWeStand

Alongside @DonaldNorcross in the House and @SenBobCasey in the Senate, I introduced the Tax Fairness for Workers Act to do just that.

It's time to restore the tax deduction that Trump's GOP Tax Scam ripped away from working families.

Union dues should be tax deductible.

Pass it on.

I was proud to join President Biden and the working men and women of organized labor at today's Labor Day parade in Philadelphia. 

I was raised in a union household. I know first hand how unions fight for fair wages and benefits for workers. I will always have their backs.

Great news for the Delaware River! 

Today the @USFWS announced that more than $14.9 million in funding will support nearly 40 conservation projects along the Del. River watershed. The projects include 6 funded through the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law and will improve access, recreational opps, and water quality.
inquirer.com/science/climate…

With the Inflation Reduction Act, Democrats empowered Medicare to negotiate lower prescription drug prices.

Soon, hundreds of thousands of Pennsylvanians will be saving money on some of the most-used prescription drugs.

Today is @NatlParkService’s 107th birthday! 

From the Liberty Bell to Independence Hall, here in Philadelphia we have so many Nat'l Park treasures to appreciate. 

Let's continue to cherish and conserve our nation’s natural and cultural treasures, ensuring that they inspire generations for years to come. #NPSBirthday @INDEPENDENCENHP

Unemployment here in Pennsylvania is at the *lowest level on record.*

When we make historic investments in growing the middle class, we get historic results.

As a Philly fan, I'll do without the Green Monster reference.

But @SenMarkey and I can agree that the Inflation Reduction Act will create millions of clean energy jobs across this country.

With the Inflation Reduction Act, we made sure seniors and other Medicare beneficiaries never pay more than $35/month for insulin.

One year later, thousands of people here in Philly are paying less for their insulin.

The word historic might be overused at times — but not about the #InflationReductionAct.

I was proud to vote for this law one year ago and I'm even prouder today as we see the historic impacts of new clean energy jobs and lower health care costs across America.

After decades of politicians talking about capping insulin prices, letting Medicare negotiate drug prices, and lowering health care costs — Democrats got it done with the Inflation Reduction Act.

And every single House Republican voted against it.

One year ago today, President Biden signed the Inflation Reduction Act into law.

Now, thousands of people here in Philly — and millions more across America — are saving hundreds of dollars every year on their health insurance.

On this solemn occasion marking 2 years of Marc Fogel being illegally detained in Russia, we reflect on the continuing strength and resilience displayed by Marc and his family. 

My thoughts remain with them as we push for Marc's safe return and an end to this terrible chapter.

On the 88th anniversary of Social Security, Republicans are still trying to rip away Americans' hard-earned benefits.

Democrats won't let that happen — we're fighting to protect Social Security for generations to come by making the wealthy contribute their fair share.

One year ago, I spoke on the House floor about how the #InflationReductionAct would change lives in Philly & across the U.S.

For decades, politicians talked about things like climate investments & letting Medicare negotiate drug prices, but we got it done.

Democrats delivered.
I’m proud to receive @WhiteCoatWaste’s Waste Warrior award for my work to fight cruel and unnecessary government experiments on dogs, cats, & other animals

Thanks to everyone who organized #NationalNightOut events across the PA-02 district last night--AND--a big shout out to my district staff for partnering in this annual community building tradition that creates contacts that last all year round. Great job everyone! #NNO2023

Nobody, not even the former President of the United States, is above the law.

My statement on President Trump's indictment:

Inflation is down, wages are up, and over 13 million jobs have been created.

It's time for the Fed to protect workers and pause the interest rate hikes before they trigger a job-killing recession.

My op-ed with @RepValHoyle:
thehill.com/opinion/congress…

It's a simple idea: if corporate executives can get a tax write off for their private jets, workers should get a tax deduction for their work expenses and union dues.

I just introduced the Tax Fairness for Workers Act along with @DonaldNorcross and 160 other Representatives.

Proud to be with @POTUS in Philly today to celebrate the progress we've made since he took office.

While Republicans try to cut critical programs and give new tax breaks to the wealthy, Bidenomics is at work for all our families.

Read more in my op-ed:
realclearpennsylvania.com/ar…

We got I-95 rebuilt in record time.

Philadelphia is proving we can still do big things in this country — and with @POTUS Biden's infrastructure law, we're going to keep rebuilding and modernizing America's communities.

There were 2,668 community projects in the Transportation, Housing, and Urban Development bill. Only three contain the letters "LGBT," including Philly's William Way Center.

It's not a coincidence those are the ones Republicans defunded — it's bigotry.
washingtonpost.com/business/…
And thank you to @rosadelauro, @RepStenyHoyer, @RepMarkPocan, and every other Democratic committee member who stood up for the Philadelphia community today.

I may not be able to speak in the Appropriations Committee, but I won't stand by while House Republicans attack LGBT Philadelphians.

Thank you @RepDerekKilmer for reading my statement on the homophobic attack stripping funding I secured for Philly's William Way LGBT Center.

Right now, House Republicans are trying to strip funding I secured for Philadelphia's William Way LGBT Community Center — just because they provide social services for our LGBT community.

This is outrageous and disgusting bigotry.

If you were wondering why MAGA Republicans in Congress vote against almost anything that helps working families, this explains it all.

They see investments in education and medical care as a problem. They actually think Medicare, Medicaid, and Social Security were a mistake.

Great news!

Thanks to @POTUS, @usedgov is fixing historical failures so borrowers get the student loan forgiveness they deserve. This will bring much-needed relief to over 800,000 borrowers.

But the work isn't done yet. We won't stop fighting to end the student debt crisis.

They're not even trying to hide it.

House Republicans want to block the IRS from making it free and easy to file your taxes online.

And in the very same funding bill they're making it easier for big corporations and the ultra-rich to cheat on their taxes.

Attention Veterans! We are accepting applications in our Congressional Office for the position of Wounded Warrior Advocate.

Are you a Veteran with a passion for service? 
Do you want to make a difference in the lives of fellow Veterans? 
We have an incredible opportunity for you to join our team as a Wounded Warrior Advocate.

For more information, go to the "WOUNDED WARRIOR" page on my official website:
boyle.house.gov/wounded-warr…

Social Security is a sacred promise that, after a lifetime of hard work, Americans deserve to retire with dignity.

I will *always* fight to protect that promise from the cruel cuts pushed by MAGA Republicans.
democrats-budget.house.gov/h…

House Republicans are pushing to cut Social Security benefits for over 250 million Americans.

I've got a better idea — I just introduced a bill with @SenWhitehouse that will extend Social Security solvency for generations to come by making the ultra-rich pay their fair share.

Our economic recovery is the strongest of any nation on earth — and that's no accident.

@HouseDemocrats and @POTUS have delivered historic investments in American families, American manufacturing, and good-paying American jobs.

Today, the Small Business Administration (SBA) opened a Business Recovery Center in Philadelphia. The goal is to assist those Tacony based businesses in the PA02 district that were impacted by the I-95 bridge collapse.

For more information--click the link below to my website. @SBAgov
boyle.house.gov/I95informati…

Today marks 100 days since journalist Evan Gershkovich was wrongfully detained by Russian authorities. Evan’s parents live in my district. It is for the entire Gershkovich family that I reiterate my solidarity with Evan and convey my support for efforts to immediately and unconditionally have him, Paul Whelan, and Marc Fogel released. #IStandWithEvan

Happy Independence Day from Philadelphia--the nation’s birthplace!🇺🇸  

Here is where it all began. Take a moment to visit Independence Hall, Congress Hall, the Liberty Bell, Carpenters Hall, and the many other special sites in our national story @INDEPENDENCENHP .  May they inspire you as they continue to inspire me. 
Have a happy and healthy holiday!

I support 340,000 UPS @Teamsters who are taking a stand for all working families. These dedicated workers put their lives at risk to deliver goods to Pennsylvania homes so the rest of us could stay safe during the pandemic. They deserve a fair contract in return for their sacrifices.

The Dobbs decision one year ago reaffirmed that we can’t count on the Supreme Court to protect our freedoms. I am proud to stand with Martin Luther King III and other activists to demand greater transparency and ethics from the highest court in the land. Reform the Court now!

I've noticed a pattern here in Washington...

Republicans will say they don't want to cut Social Security, and then a few months later they're inevitably right back to attacking Americans' hard-earned retirement benefits.

I spoke with @thelauracoates about the GOP's latest plot.

On #Juneteenth, we honor the emancipation of enslaved African Americans in 1865, celebrating their freedom and acknowledging the invaluable contributions of the Black community to our nation. 

It is essential that we always remember the brave individuals who fought against slavery and advocated for racial justice and equality.
Thanks to @NBCNews for inviting me and my fellow Dads Caucus members to share our personal experiences balancing the challenges of fatherhood w/ serving in Congress.  Happy Fathers Day!

As @POTUS says, a budget is a statement of values.

So what does it say that House Republicans released a new budget that would raise the Social Security retirement age for *9.6 million people* here in Pennsylvania?

#HandsOffSocialSecurity
democrats-budget.house.gov/h…

Every American needs to know that House Republicans want to force them to work longer for less — all while wasting billions of dollars on more favors to special interests and handouts to the ultra-wealthy.
Happy Flag Day from Philadelphia!

We can't keep doing the same thing and expecting a different result. My Debt Ceiling Reform Act will permanently end the brinkmanship and protect our nation from default.

Here's how it works.

I've been in touch with @GovernorShapiro, the White House, and Secretary Buttigieg about the I-95 collapse.

I'm confident that every possible resource will be brought to bear in order to make sure I-95 is rebuilt as soon as possible.

Today I personally toured the I-95 collapse and met with federal, state, and local officials about the next steps. While the road ahead will be a challenge for all of us who live here, after today’s briefing I am confident that we will get the damaged section rebuilt as fast as humanly possible.

I also want to thank the bravery and quick thinking of the police officers and fire fighters who were at the scene and prevented what could have been a much bigger disaster. Their actions early Sunday morning saved lives.

Interstate 95 is a vital transportation artery, and a major link of our regional economy. It plays a lead role in the lives of nearly everyone in Philadelphia and its collar counties—directly and indirectly. I will continue to do everything within the scope of my office to ensure that Philadelphia is given every resource we need to repair this asset and get things back to normal.

I have also reached out to Philadelphia Mayor Jim Kenney to let him know that my office is available to help with any federal support as the repair process plays out in the weeks and months ahead.
(Cont)

I have reached out to President Biden and to Transportation Sec. Buttigieg to ensure that all available federal resource be deployed quickly to repair the damaged section of I-95 in my district that collapsed early this morning. 
(thread)

*This* is how President Trump stored highly classified documents about nuclear weapons and American military capabilities. There can be no doubt: he is a threat to our national security.

The law must apply equally to everyone — and that includes Donald Trump.

MAGA extremists want to build power so they can impose an extreme agenda on our nation.

We must block every weapon they can use against American families — starting with the threat of default.

That's exactly what my Debt Ceiling Reform Act does.
wsj.com/articles/democrats-p…

This bill will stop these extremists from weaponizing the debt ceiling while preserving Congressional oversight.

Read my full statement on the introduction of the Debt Ceiling Reform Act with @SenatorDurbin. ⤵️
boyle.house.gov/media-center…

We just saw MAGA Republicans use the debt ceiling to hold our nation hostage — threatening to crash the economy unless they got their extreme demands.

Today, I'm introducing legislation to make sure it never happens again.

Linking here to useful @EPA & US @ForestService resources to provide you with up to the minute air quality information and how you can protect your health as we all work through our current air quality situation here in Philadelphia resulting from the Canadian wildfires.

We must enact the #AmericanFamilyAct to make the #ChildTaxCredit permanent to help working families get ahead and provide financial security in the face of rising costs.
newrepublic.com/post/169284/…

As long as MAGA Republicans can take the debt ceiling hostage, there is a direct threat to our entire economy and millions of American jobs.

It's time to end the insanity.
wsj.com/articles/democrats-w…

Today, on the 79th anniversary of D-Day, we celebrate the brave servicemembers who stormed the beaches of Normandy and honor those who did not return home.  
Their sacrifices helped pave the way to victory in WWII.

MAGA Republicans tried — and failed — to force devastating cuts to Medicaid, veterans' benefits, and more by threatening to default on our nation's bills.

Now we need to make sure they can never try this dangerous hostage scheme again.

🛟 The American Rescue Plan
⚡️ The Inflation Reduction Act
💻 The CHIPS and Science Act
🚸 The Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act

It's no accident that over 13 million jobs have been created since @POTUS took office.

The Republican brinkmanship and manufactured crises must end.

This must be the last time these MAGA extremists are able to hold American livelihoods hostage with their threats against the full faith and credit of the United States.
cnn.com/2023/06/01/politics/…

🚨Every single House Democrat has now signed my discharge petition to force a vote that would protect American families from the threat of default.🚨

We can end this crisis right now if just 5 Republicans will join us and stand up to the extremists in their party.

Matt Gaetz just admitted Republicans are holding the US economy hostage.

The pro-default extremists in the GOP are willing to risk economic calamity to force their cruel cuts on American families. House Democrats will not let that happen.

MAGA Republicans made a lot of promises to get elected.

I don't remember "crashing the economy on purpose with a default" being one of them.

There never has been and never will be anything "fiscally responsible" about defaulting on America's bills, killing millions of jobs, and plunging our economy into recession.

MAGA Republicans aren't the party of "fiscal responsibility" — and they never were.

MAGA Republicans are the only ones threatening to kill millions of jobs unless they get their demands for cruel cuts.

They can end this crisis whenever they want — all they have to do is stop holding our economy hostage.

This week I had the honor of meeting the family of PA native Marc Fogel, who has been imprisoned in Russia since 2021. 

Today, I reiterate my calls for @StateDept  to designate Mr. Fogel as “wrongfully detained.” We must bring Marc, Evan Gershkovich, and so many others home.

While multi-billion-dollar hospitality corporations like @Accor are getting richer, workers are forced to sacrifice their health and spending time with loved ones just to make ends meet.

I stand with Sofitel workers who are making the brave decision to unite and organize a union to better themselves and their families.

American families cannot afford the devastating consequences of defaulting on our nation's bills.

@HouseDemocrats are going to do everything in our power to prevent MAGA Republicans from tanking our economy and killing millions of jobs.

Today, I filed a discharge petition to give Congress a path forward to prevent a job-killing default.

Will a handful of House Republicans stand with us to get this done — or will they make American families pay the price for MAGA Republicans' extreme hostage scheme?

I just filed a discharge petition to give Congress the flexibility to prevent a catastrophic default.

Millions of jobs are on the line — and Congress must do everything in our power to protect American families and our economy from this MAGA-manufactured crisis.

The nonpartisan @USCBO just revealed House Republicans' plan to extend Trump's #GOPTaxScam and protect tax giveaways to the wealthy would add $3.5 TRILLION to the deficit.

They're not the party of "fiscal responsibility" — and they never were.

MAGA Republicans want to claim they're not cutting veterans' health care.

So why does their Default on America Act immediately cut $2B from the VA?

Why did they release a bill today that underfunds the veterans' toxic exposures fund by $14.7B?

Tuesday is Election Day. Voting is one of the most important parts of any democracy. By voting, we are all active participants in our democratic process. Get out and #Vote !

Republicans can skip holding a full hearing on their extreme Default on America Act, but they can't stop us from talking about how their cruel cuts and dangerous default threats will harm American families.

Infinite thanks to the thousands of PA nurses who have worked bravely on the front lines to keep us safe and healthy, thank you!

Happy #NationalNursesWeek

I am deeply saddened to hear of the passing of Cpl. Roland Scarinci. He was a true hero who selflessly served his country. Roland was a constituent of mine and I was honored to present him with a Congressional Citation last year. My condolences to Roland's family. May he Rest in Peace.
#RememberingOurVeterans

As co-chair of the Congressional Macedonian Caucus, it was a great honor to host Macedonian Prime Minister Dimitar Kovačevski this week in my office. We discussed several topics critical to the relationship between our nations. This year also marks the 15th Anniversary of our Strategic Partnership and Cooperation agreement.

⬇️ Inflation is down for the 10th month in a row.

⬆️ Jobs are up for the 28th month in a row.

Democrats are fighting to continue growing our economy, while Republicans are threatening to throw this progress away by defaulting on America's bills.

The deadline to apply for LIHEAP is approaching fast. This Friday May 12th is the final day to register for the program.

"It has been five weeks now that journalist Evan Gershkovich has been wrongfully detained by Russian authorities. To date, Russia has failed to present any convincing proof to support its concocted allegations. 
It is a bitter irony that on the same week that we celebrate World Press Freedom Day, we continue to see these types of despicable actions by governments around the world. The arrest of any journalist is a troubling violation of press freedom worldwide--

Defaulting on America's bills — or even coming close — will be catastrophic for America's economy, for our standing in the world, and for our national security.

What does it say about our democracy if Congress can't protect the full faith and credit of the US?
Thank you to all Firefighters for your bravery, professionalism and all that you do to keep our city safe!!

There are 18 House Republicans who call themselves "moderates."

Here's a chance for them to prove it — join with us to end MAGA Republicans' default threats. Join with us to make sure Speaker McCarthy doesn't make good on his threat to kill 7 million jobs.

If 217 House Republicans voted for a bill that makes brutal across-the-board spending cuts with no exceptions for veterans' benefits...

Then 217 House Republicans voted to cut veterans' benefits. It's that simple.

Barely passing one dead-on-arrival bill doesn't mean Speaker McCarthy is in control. He's still the same man who needed 15 votes to become Speaker.

Here's why I'm still worried the promises he made to his extreme MAGA allies could send us over the default cliff. ⤵️

BREAKING: @SecYellen just warned that America could default on our bills by June 1st unless Speaker McCarthy ends his hostage scheme.

Right now, the greatest threat to our nation's economy and the well-being of American families is Speaker McCarthy and his MAGA allies.
Last chance to enter the 2023 Congressional Art Competition! (Friday is the final day for submissions)

Since MAGA Republicans run the House, I thought they could use a reminder from President Trump of just how dangerous their default threats are:

"I can't imagine anybody ever even thinking of using the debt ceiling as a negotiating tool."

Today, I led a letter with @RepJayapal and @RepAnnieKuster calling on Speaker McCarthy to end his default threats.

Democrats from across our caucus are united and demanding that House Republicans stop threatening to unleash a recession that would kill millions of jobs.

The very first thing House Republicans passed was legislation making it easier for the rich to cheat on their taxes.

Now, they're pushing an extreme plan that would gut support for American families and result in 780,000 fewer jobs.

How does any of this help working people?
This support will improve and extend accessibility to these baseball fields for nearly 9,000 neighborhood kids from ages 6 thru 18. Go Angels!!

This weekend I stopped by the Olney Angels opening day to throw out the first pitch and deliver a Community Project Funding check for $500,000 that will support Feliz Filadelfia’s installation and maintenance of a new artificial turf field, lighting and an electronic scoreboard

Let's be crystal clear about what's going on here.

House Republicans are threatening to crash the economy unless Democrats go along with their devastating cuts and extreme ideas.

There's no principled stand here, just a partisan hostage scheme.

Republicans have apparently learned nothing from their failed debt ceiling dealings, so I'll make it clear:

The best thing they can do for the American people is to let the hostage go, stop the chaos, and end this reckless brinksmanship.

Delivering today's speech threatening our economy at the New York Stock Exchange shows Speaker McCarthy is either in denial about the danger of his threats or intentionally hoping for market turmoil.

I'm not sure which is worse.
LINK TO MORE INFO: house.gov/educators-and-stud…
On this historically significant day for Sikhs, I'm wishing our Sikh American friends a happy #Vaisakhi!

They simply cannot help themselves.

House Republicans have shown us who they are — and who they're willing to put on the chopping block.

Social Security is a sacred promise that Americans have EARNED and I will always fight to defend it.

"The average American has the same chance of a long and healthy life as someone born in the most deprived town in England."

American life expectancy is headed in the wrong direction — instead of doing something about it, Republicans want you to work longer for less. Appalling.

"The Good Friday Agreement has nurtured a generation of people who know only peace as their world --and not the darkness and violence of the past that ripped families and neighborhoods apart. The agreement has also provided a shared foundation for peace that has allowed Ireland’s border communities to thrive and grow over the last quarter century.”
FULL STMT: boyle.house.gov/media-center…

Speaker McCarthy's debt ceiling brinksmanship can only end one way — with a clean vote to raise the borrowing limit.

I spoke with @andrewrsorkin about why it's time to end the chaos, raise the debt ceiling, and then get back to the normal budget process.

"I applaud the news that Finland has officially become the newest member of NATO. Finland’s sovereign and strategic decision to join the alliance sends a clear message to the world that it is prepared to meet the challenges posed by our adversaries." 

MY FULL STATEMENT: boyle.house.gov/media-center…

House Republicans are the dog that caught the car.

They took the debt ceiling hostage — and they've wasted the last 3 months squabbling over what they should do next.

It's time for Speaker McCarthy to end the chaos and put the American people over extreme MAGA antics.

Today's PCE report is good news. It confirms that inflation continues to decline as we transition from a rapid post-COVID recovery to steady and stable economic growth. The last thing we need now is for MAGA brinkmanship over the debt ceiling to cause a global economic crisis.

Republicans are using their newfound power to threaten our economy and the livelihoods of millions of Americans.

I spoke with @juliemason about why I'm worried — and why Republicans' brinksmanship will only get more dangerous.

If Republicans are now willing to admit the debt ceiling is different from the budget process, then what the hell are they holding our economy hostage for?

Let’s raise the debt ceiling now.

I joined @AnnMarie and @JMathieuReports on @BloombergTV to discuss why it is INSANE to play around with the debt ceiling, especially given the events of the last several weeks.

It is in our national interest to raise the debt ceiling and to do it as soon as possible.

My Republican colleagues seem to think the American people have forgotten about their plans to gut Social Security.

To help clear things up, here's a list of just some of the Republicans who have called for slashing Social Security benefits.
On its 13th birthday, I’m celebrating the incredible success of the #ACA. This law has been a lifeline to millions of Americans, helping them finally gain access to quality, affordable health care.
Wishing an easy fast and a blessed Eid to all who will celebrate #Ramadan tonight.

Kevin McCarthy made a deal with extreme MAGA Republicans to become Speaker – now they're holding our economy hostage until they get what they want.

@CapehartJ and I discussed how McCarthy must stop submitting to extremists & start governing in Americans' best interest instead.

Nonpartisan analysis from the @USCBO proves Republicans' budget math doesn't add up.

It's time for Speaker McCarthy to tell us exactly who House Republicans will put on the chopping block to pay for more tax giveaways to the wealthy.

Shots in arms.
Money in pockets.
Children in schools.

Thanks to the #AmericanRescuePlan, we've created millions of jobs and delivered a historic recovery.

Democrats put #PeopleOverPolitics and delivered a historic economic recovery with the American Rescue Plan.

And every single House Republican voted against it.

While House Republicans want to spend trillions on more tax cuts for the ultra-rich, @HouseDemocrats are fighting for fiscal responsibility and a budget that invests in working families.

I spoke to @Lawrence about President Biden's trip to Philadelphia to announce his budget. ⤵️
This reads more like a ransom note than a budget proposal...

It was an honor to join @POTUS as he announced his FY24 Budget.

Dr. Ethel D. Allen was a true trailblazer. 

In 1971, she was the first black woman elected to Philadelphia City Council. She was the only African-American --and only woman --in the Obstetrics-Gynecology Society after graduating from the Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine. She also served as the Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania under Gov. Dick Thornburgh. #BlackHistoryMonth

My offices will be closed today--Monday, February 20th-- in observance of the Presidents Day holiday. 

All offices will reopen tomorrow with normal operating hours on Tuesday, Feb. 21st.

Sending my deepest condolences to the family of Temple Police Officer Christopher Fitzgerald who was killed in the line of duty protecting Temple's students and campus this weekend. 

Officer Fitzgerald's ultimate sacrifice serves as a grim reminder of the dangers law enforcement faces every day they put on their badges to protect our communities.

Rev. Leon Sullivan, former pastor of Zion Baptist Church, was a tireless advocate for social & economic justice in Philly.
